DOC.brief_summary: This protocol describe pilot study intend test hypothesis patient acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) cause plaque erosion stabilize effective antithrombotic treatment without stent implantation , thereby avoid early late complication relate percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Paradigm Shift Treatment Patients With ACS
DOC.criteria: Men nonpregnant woman > 18 year age < 75 year age Patients undergo cardiac catheterization ACS . Patients STEMI , NSTEMI , UAP include . STEMI define continuous chest pain > 30 minute , arrival hospital within 12 hour chest pain onset , STsegment elevation > 0.1 mV least two contiguous lead , new leave bundlebranch block 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , elevate cardiac marker ( troponin T/I creatine kinaseMB ) . NSTEMI define progressive crescendo pattern angina angina rest , absence STsegment elevation 12lead ECG , elevate cardiac marker . UAP define new onset angina , progressive crescendo pattern angina , angina rest . Culprit lesion locate native coronary artery TIMI flow grade 3 diameter stenosis < 70 % angiogram Definite erosion define OCT Patients able provide write informed consent Left ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % . Life expectancy < 1 year . Contraindication contrast medium . Creatinine level > 2.0 mg/dL endstage kidney disease . Serious liver dysfunction . Patients hemodynamic electrical instability ( include shock ) . Any contraindication use ticagrelor . Investigator consider patient suitable .
